13975.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>...My husband was scattered as the
hand of God before Arnoud was born.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13975.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「……私の夫は　アルノーが生まれる前に
　神の御手として　散った。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13975.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: ……내 남편은 아르노가 태어나기 전에
　신의 종으로서 생을 마감했다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13975.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……我的丈夫在生前也是神之使者，
不过在步野宇出生之前就去世了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13975.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……我的丈夫在生前也是神之使者，
不過在阿爾諾出生前就去世了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13976.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I have learned a lot from my husband's
legacy. I was afraid that there was no
one that I could not save.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13976.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「夫の遺志を継ぎ　多くのことを学んできた。
　おこがましくも　自分に救えぬ者など
　いないと思っていた。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13976.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 난 남편의 유지를 이어 많은 것을 배웠다.
　오만하게도 내가 구할 수 없는 사람은
　없다고 생각했다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13976.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我继承丈夫的遗志学习了很多事情。
虽然有些自大，但是我一直以为
没有我拯救不了的人。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13976.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我繼承丈夫的遺志學習了很多事情。
雖然有些自大，但是我一直以為
沒有我拯救不了的人。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13977.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>But you see I can't even help my
own child.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13977.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「だが　どうだ……。
　私は　我が子すら　助けてやれない。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13977.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 하지만 내 꼴을 보아라…….
　난 내 아이조차 구해주지 못해.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13977.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>但是，到头来……我连自己的孩子都无法拯救。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13977.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>但是，到頭來……
我連自己的孩子都救不了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13978.en:
... Do you remember? At the time of your baptism, God Eldona's Baptism, he foresaw the disaster
and needed you.
13978.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「……<pc>　覚えていますか？
　洗礼の儀の時　エルドナ神は　災いを予見し
　あなたのことを　必要としていましたね。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13978.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: ……<pc>, 기억하십니까?
　세례식 때 엘드나 신께서 재앙을 예견하시고
　당신의 힘을 필요로 하셨지요.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13978.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>……<pc>，你还记得吗？
洗礼仪式时埃尔多纳神预言了灾难，
并且说需要你的力量。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13978.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>……<pc>，你還記得嗎？
洗禮儀式時，艾爾多娜神預言了災難，
並且說需要你的力量。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13979.en: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>What on earth was that all about?<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13979.ja: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「いったい　あれは　なんだったのでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13979.ko: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 그건 대체 무슨 뜻이었던 걸까요?<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13979.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>那到底是什么意思啊？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13979.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>那到底是什麼意思呢？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13980.en:
<pc> reached for a Wood
Carved Idol of Eldona...
13980.ja:
<pc>は
木彫りのエルドナ神像に　手を伸ばした……。
13980.ko:
{pc}|hpp(은,는)
목조 엘드나 신상을 향해 손을 뻗었다…….
13980.zh-Hans:
<pc>向埃尔多纳木雕神像
伸出了手……
13980.zh-Hant:
<pc>向木雕的艾爾多娜神像
伸出了手……

13981.ja:
<center>……<pc>よ……
……よく　来てくれました……

13982.ja: <center>……さあ　人々を　助…けるのです……

13983.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I followed you because I didn't think
you'd be here, but I didn't think you'd
actually be here.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13983.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「まさかと思って　後をつけてきたが……
　本当に　ここに来るとはな。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13983.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 혹시나 싶어서 따라와 봤더니……
　정말로 여기 올 줄이야.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13983.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我放心不下便跟在你身后……
没想到你真的会来这里。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13983.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我放心不下便跟在你身後……
沒想到你真的會來這裡。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13984.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>... you are wrong.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13984.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「<pc>……。
　お前は　まちがっている。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13984.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: <pc>…….
　네 생각은 틀렸다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13984.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>……
你犯错了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13984.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>……
你錯了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13985.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>The Idol is, to us Kirika monks, the very
essence of Eldona. No matter what,
we would never lay a hand on his body.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13985.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「その神像は　我らキリカ修道会の僧侶にとって
　エルドナ神そのものだ。たとえ　何があろうと
　神の身体に　手をかけることなど……。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13985.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 그 신상은 우리 키리카 수도회 승려들에게는
　엘드나 신 그 자체나 다름없어. 어떤 이유로든
　신의 몸에 손을 대는 건 있을 수 없는 일…….<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13985.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>这尊神像对于我们雾迦修道会的僧侣来说，
就是埃尔多纳神本身。
无论发生了什么事情，都不能碰触神……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13985.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>這尊神像對於我們霧迦修道會的僧侶來說，
就是艾爾多娜神本身。
無論發生了什麼事情，都不能傷害神的身體……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13986.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Now put that Idol back on its pedestal.<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13986.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「さあ　その神像を　台座の上に戻すのだ。 <yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13986.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 자, 그 신상을 받침대 위에 돌려놔라.<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13986.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>快，将那尊神像放回台座上去。<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13986.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>快，將那尊神像放回台座上去。<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13987.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>That's... that's fine.
I didn't see what you did.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13987.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「……それでいい。
　私は　お前のしたことを見なかった。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13987.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: ……잘했다.
　네가 한 짓은 못 본 것으로 하마.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13987.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……这样就好了。
你刚才所做的事情我就当作没看见。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13987.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……這樣就好了。
你剛才所做的事情我就當作沒看見。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13990.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Then do what you want.
I... can't stop you.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13990.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「ならば　好きにするがいい。
　私には……　お前を止めることが　できない。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13990.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 마음대로 해라.
　나로서는…… 널 막을 수 없으니까.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13990.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>那就随你吧。
我……没有办法阻止你。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13990.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>那就隨你吧。
我……沒辦法阻止你。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001521.en:
<pc> received the
Wood Carved Idol (Key Item)!<me 60>
19001521.ja:
<pc>は
木彫りの神像（だいじなもの）を　手に入れた！<me 60>
19001521.zh-Hans:
<pc>获得了
木雕神像（重要物品）！<me 60>
19001521.zh-Hant:
<pc>獲得了
木雕神像（重要物品）！<me 60>

13992.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>What a surprise!
That Wood Carved Idol is the
Idol of the Order of Kirika!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13992.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「なんと！　その木彫りの像は……
　キリカ修道会の　ご神像じゃないですか！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13992.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 맙소사! 그 나무 조각상은……
　키리카 수도회의 신상 아닙니까!?<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13992.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>什么！这尊木雕像……
这不是雾迦修道会的神像吗！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13992.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>什麼！這尊木雕像……
這不是霧迦修道會的神像嗎！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13993.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>No way. Are you going to save
everyone by burning that Idol made
of sparkling wood?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13993.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「まさか　<pc>さん！
　その　閃香樹でできた　ご神像を焚いて
　みんなを助ける　おつもりですか！？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13993.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨, 설마!
　그 섬향수 신상을 태워
　사람들을 구할 작정이십니까!?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13993.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001><pc>！难不成你打算焚烧
这尊用闪香树雕刻而成的神像，
来拯救大家吗？！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13993.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001><pc>！你難不成是打算焚燒
這尊用閃香樹雕刻而成的神像
來拯救大家嗎！？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13994.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>Please don't lie to me.
Why else would you bring an Idol
to a place like this?<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13994.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「ウソを　つかないでください。
　こんな所に　ご神像を　持ってくる理由なんて
　他に　ないじゃないですか！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13994.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 거짓말하지 마십시오.
　이런 곳에 신상을 가져올 이유가
　그것 말고 뭐가 있습니까!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13994.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>别骗我了。
将神像带到这种地方来，
还能有什么别的理由！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13994.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>別騙我了。
將神像帶到這種地方來，
還能有什麼別的理由！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13995.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001><pc> is going to help
everyone by burning this Idol, isn't he?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13995.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「<pc>さんは　この　ご神像を焚いて
　みんなを　助けるつもりなんでしょう？ <yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13995.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨는 이 신상을 태워
　사람들을 구할 작정이신 거죠!?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13995.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001><pc>是打算要焚烧这尊神像，
来拯救大家吧？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13995.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001><pc>是打算要焚燒這尊神像
來拯救大家吧？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13996.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>I understand! This perfumer Karan,
too, will have a hara!
Now let's make some incense!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13996.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「わかりました！！
　この　香術師カランも　ハラをくくります！
　すぐに　お香を作りましょう！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13996.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 알겠습니다!!
　저 향술사 카란도 각오를 다지겠습니다!
　당장 향을 만들죠!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13996.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>我明白了！！
让我香术师加览来助你一臂之力！
立即做香料吧！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13996.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>我明白了！！
讓我香術師卡朗來助你一臂之力！
立即做香料吧！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13997.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>All right... all that's left is to light
this piece...<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13997.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「よし……。
　後は　このかけらに　火をつければ……。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13997.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 좋아…….
　이제 이 조각에 불을 붙이면…….<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13997.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>好……
接下来只要将这些碎片点着……<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13997.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>好……
接下來只要在這些碎片上點火……<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13998.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>We did it... Look!
Arnoud's birthmark is gone!
The Reaper's Breath has cured him!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13998.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「やった……　見てください！
　アルノー君のアザが　消えました！
　死神の息吹の病が　治ったんですよ！！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13998.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 성공이야…… 보세요!
　아르노의 반점이 사라졌어요!
　사신의 숨결로 인한 병이 나았습니다!!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13998.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>成功了……看啊！
步野宇的斑痕消失了！
死神气息治好了！！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13998.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>成功了……快看！
阿爾諾的斑痕消失了！
死神吐息治好了！！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13999.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「アルノー……　よかった。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13999.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 아르노…… 다행이다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13999.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>步野宇……太好了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13999.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>阿爾諾……太好了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24400.en:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>Well, well, well.
What's that noise?<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24400.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>「おやおや。
　いったい　なんの　さわぎですか？<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24400.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>: 응?
　왜들 이리 소란스러운 겁니까?<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24400.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>哎呀呀，
这里究竟在吵什么？<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24400.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>哎呀呀，
這裡究竟在吵什麼？<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14001.en:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>This... no way, this piece of wood...
Could be an Idol!<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14001.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>「こ　これは………。

<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>这、这是……
难不成这些木片是……神像？！<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14001.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00788 _normal m00001>這、這是……
難不成這些木片是……神像！？<stop_lip_animation n00788 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14003.en: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>Seize this great Sinner!<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14004.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>请等一等！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14005.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Was it a mistake what <pc> did!
Did not God...God Eldona...tell you
to save the people!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14005.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「<pc>のしたことは　過ちでしょうか！
　神は……エルドナ神は　人々を救えと
　おっしゃっていたではありませんか！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14005.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: {pc}|hpp(이,가) 한 짓이 정녕 죄입니까!?
　신께서는…… 엘드나 신께서는
　사람들을 구하라고 하시지 않으셨습니까!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14005.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>做错了吗？
神……埃尔多纳神不是
一直主张要拯救人们吗？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14005.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>做錯了嗎？
神……艾爾多娜神不是一直主張
要拯救人們嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14006.ja: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「だまりなさい！ <stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14006.ko: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 그 입 다무십시오!<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14007.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>I am disappointed in you, Helga.
You would so easily give up your faith
if your child's life depended on it.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14007.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「あなたには　失望しましたよ　ヘルガ。
　我が子の命が　かかったら
　簡単に　信仰をまげてしまうとは。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14007.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 헬가 승정, 승정님께는 실망이 큽니다.
　자식의 목숨이 달리니
　이토록 쉽게 믿음을 저버릴 줄이야.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14007.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>我对你太失望了，历雅。
一旦关系到自己孩子的性命，
就轻易抛弃了信仰。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14007.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>我對妳太失望了，赫爾嘉。
一旦關係到自己孩子的性命，
就輕易拋棄了信仰。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14008.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>It is true that Idols are irreplaceable
treasures. But... isn't human life an even
more precious treasure?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14008.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「確かに　神像は　かけがえのない宝です。
　しかし……　人の命は　それ以上に
　大切にすべき宝なのでは　ありませんか！？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14008.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 신상이 둘도 없는 보물인 건 사실입니다.
　하지만…… 사람의 목숨은
　그보다 더 귀한 보물 아닙니까!?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14008.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>神像的确是无价之宝。
但是……人的生命
不应该更加宝贵吗？！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14008.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>神像的確是無價之寶。
但是……人的生命
不是應該更加寶貴嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14009.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>At this rate, the Reaper's breath will
spread throughout the world. How
many people do you intend to let die?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14009.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「このままでは　死神の息吹は
　世界中に広がるでしょう。どれだけの人を
　見殺しにする　おつもりですか！？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14009.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 이대로 있다간 사신의 숨결이
　온 세상에 퍼질 겁니다. 얼마나 많은 사람들을
　죽게 내버려두실 작정입니까!?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14009.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>这样下去，死神气息会扩散到全世界去的。
您打算对多少人见死不救？！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14009.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>這樣下去，
死神吐息會擴散到全世界。
您打算對多少人見死不救！？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14010.ja: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「見殺し……ですと？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14010.ko: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 죽게…… 내버려둔다고요?<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14010.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>你说我……见死不救？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14010.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>妳說我……見死不救？<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24402.en:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>High Priest!
Let's help the sick who remain!
It is our duty to save the people!<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24402.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>「大僧正！　残る病人たちを　助けましょう！
　人々を救うことこそが　ボクたちの務めのはず！<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24402.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>: 대승정님! 다른 환자들을 구해요!
　사람들을 구하는 게 저희의 의무 아닌가요!?<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24402.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>大僧正！我们去救剩下的病人吧！
救人正是我们的职责啊！<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>
24402.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>大僧正！我們去救剩下的病人吧！
救人正是我們的職責啊！<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14012.en:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>And isn't this what God Eldona's Baptism

14012.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>「そ…それに　洗礼の儀で　エルドナ神が

　このことだったのでは　ないでしょうか！ <stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14012.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>: 게… 게다가 세례식 때 엘드나 신께서
　<pc>의 힘을 필요로 하셨던 건
　이 순간을 위해서가 아니었을까요!?<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14012.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>而……而且，在洗礼仪式上埃尔多纳神
不是说过要借助<pc>的力量吗？

14012.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>而……而且，在洗禮儀式上，艾爾多娜神

說不定指的就是這件事情啊！<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14013.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>Certainly, <pc> made a decision

Eldona said that God needed it...<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「確かに　我々に　できなかった決断を

14013.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 확실히 우리에겐 불가능했던 결단을

　엘드나 신께서는 이걸 원하셨던 것인가…….<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14013.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>的确，<pc>做出了
我们都无法做出的决断。
埃尔多纳神需要的就是这份决心吗……<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14013.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>的確，<pc>做出了
我們都無法做出的決斷。
艾爾多娜神需要的就是這份決心嗎……<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14014.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001><pc> Forgive my rudeness.
You were right.
Let's save the sick together.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14014.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「<pc>　非礼を　お許しください。
　あなたは　正しかった。
　ともに　病人たちを救いましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14014.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 제 무례를 용서해 주십시오.

　함께 환자들을 치료합시다.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14014.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001><pc>，请原谅我的无礼。
你做得对。
让我们一同拯救病人吧。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14014.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001><pc>，請原諒我的無禮。
你做得對。
讓我們一同拯救病人吧。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14015.en:
<start_lip_sync n00793 _normal m00001>Oh, my God, he's cured!
I can see... and I can move my legs!<stop_lip_animation n00793 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14015.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00793 _normal m00001>「すごいよ　治ったっ！
　目が　見える……　足だって動く！<stop_lip_animation n00793 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14015.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00793 _normal m00001>: 우와, 다 나았어!
　눈이 보여…… 다리도 움직여!<stop_lip_animation n00793 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14015.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00793 _normal m00001>太棒了，治好了！
眼睛能看见东西了……腿也能动了！<stop_lip_animation n00793 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14015.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00793 _normal m00001>好厲害，治好了！
眼睛能看見東西……腿也能動了！<stop_lip_animation n00793 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14016.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>I guess that's all right. We have been
so caught up in formality that we have
forgotten the true teachings of God.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14016.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「……これで　いいのでしょう。
　私たちは　形ばかりに　囚われ
　まことの神の教えを　忘れていたのですね。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14016.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: ……이걸로 됐습니다.
　우리는 형태에만 얽매여
　신의 참된 가르침을 잊고 있었군요.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14016.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>……这样才是正确的吧。
我们总是拘泥于形式，
却忘记了神真正的教诲。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14016.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>……這樣才是正確的吧。
我們總是被有形的東西所束縛，
卻忘記了神真正的教誨。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14017.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00792 _normal m00001>大僧正大人……<stop_lip_animation n00792 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 이렇게 거룩할 데가…….
　<pc>, 당신은
　기적을 일으키는 사람이로군요.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14026.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>太神圣了……
<pc>，你真是一个奇迹。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14026.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>太神聖了……
<pc>，你真是一個奇蹟。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14027.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I don't know what Arnaud would have done
without you and I thank you <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14027.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「お前が　いなければ
　アルノーは　どうなっていたことか……。
　礼を言わせてもらうぞ　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14027.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 네가 없었으면
　지금쯤 아르노는 어떻게 됐을지…….
　정말 고맙다, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14027.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>如果没有你的话
步野宇不知道会怎样……
谢谢你，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14027.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>如果沒有你，
阿爾諾不知道會怎樣……
謝謝你，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14028.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>But there was no time for reassurance.
The Epidemex has flown away.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14028.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「……だが　安心しているヒマはない。
　けがれの渦は　いずこかへ
　飛び去ってしまった。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14028.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: ……하지만 아직 안심하긴 일러.
　부정한 소용돌이는 어딘가로
　사라지고 말았으니까.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14028.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……但没有空闲让我们放松。
污浊漩涡飞向了别处。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14028.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……但沒有空閒讓我們放鬆。
汙穢的漩渦
飛向了別處。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14029.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>If we continue to let that vortex run wild,
the Reaper's breath will once again appear in
the world.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14029.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「このまま　あの渦を　野放しにしていては
　死神の息吹が　ふたたび　世に現れるだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14029.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 그 소용돌이를 이대로 놔두었다간
　사신의 숨결이 다시 세상에 나타날 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14029.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>如果就这样将漩涡放任不管，
死神气息会再次降临世间的。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14029.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>如果就這樣將漩渦放任不管，
死神吐息會再次降臨世間的。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14030.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>We will surely find that vortex, so I want you
to build up your strength for the decisive
battle that will eventually come.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14030.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「あの渦は　私たちが　必ず見つけだす……。
　お前は　いずれ訪れる　決戦の時までに
　チカラを　たくわえておいてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14030.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 그 소용돌이는 우리가 반드시 찾아내마…….
　넌 언젠가 다가올 결전의 순간에 대비해
　힘을 기르도록 해라.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14030.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我们一定要找到漩涡……
决战总有一天会到来的，
在那之前，请你先积蓄力量。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14030.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我們一定要找到漩渦……
決戰總有一天會到來的，
在那之前，請你先積蓄力量。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

32316.en:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>I was so scared... my body was sucked into the
pitch dark... and it was so quiet and cold. I was...<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32316.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>「ボク　とっても　怖かった……。
　身体が　まっくらやみに　吸い込まれて
　とっても　静かで　冷たくて……。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32316.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>: 저, 정말 무서웠어요…….
　몸이 어둠 속으로 빨려 들어가는데
　너무 춥고 조용해서…….<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32316.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>我很害怕……
身体被吸进黑暗中，
那里非常寂静寒冷……<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32316.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>我很害怕……
身體被吸進黑暗中，
那裡非常寂靜寒冷……<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>

32317.en:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>In addition, a scary voice whispered to me...
'No one will help me...'<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32317.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>「おまけに　怖い声が　ボクに　ささやくんだ。
　誰も　助けてくれないよ……って。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32317.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>: 게다가 무서운 목소리가 자꾸 속삭였어요.
　아무도 구해 주지 않을 거라고…….<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32317.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>而且还有可怕的声音在对我说话。
说不会有人来救我……<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32317.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>而且還有可怕的聲音在對我說話。
說不會有人來救我……<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000713.en:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>But it wasn't like that.
<pc> you came.
Thank you for all of your help.<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000713.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>「でも　そんなこと　なかったよ。
　<pc>ねえちゃんが　来てくれたもん。
　助けてくれて　ほんとに　ありがとう。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000713.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그렇지 않았어요.
　<pc> 누나가 와 줬는걸요.
　구해 줘서 정말 고마워요.<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000713.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>但是呢，才没那么回事。
<pc>姐姐来了啊。
谢谢你救了我。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000713.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>但是，才沒那麼回事。
畢竟<pc>姊姊來了。
謝謝你救了我。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000714.en:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>But it wasn't like that.
<pc> you came.
Thank you for all of your help.<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000714.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>「でも　そんなこと　なかったよ。
　<pc>にいちゃんが　来てくれたもん。
　助けてくれて　ほんとに　ありがとう。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000714.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그렇지 않았어요.
　<pc> 형이 와 줬는걸요.
　구해 줘서 정말 고마워요.<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000714.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>但是呢，才没那么回事。
<pc>哥哥来了啊。
谢谢你救了我。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000714.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>但是，才沒那麼回事。
畢竟<pc>哥哥來了。
謝謝你救了我。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
